<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Bralani (Wind Azata)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=559)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Bralanis embody the freedom of fair competition, embracing opportunities to test their skills against worthy foes and bring mortals together with the thrill of good-natured sports and contests. Their interest in constructive conflict also extends to higher stakes, such as diplomatic negotiations. In these cases, bralanis ensure that neither side's desires are crushed by the other's and work as mediators when needed. They believe in friendly contests to diffuse tension. When discussions are going well, bralanis step back, allowing the participants to shape their own futures. They delight in sailing through violent storms as wind, basking in the raw energy.

**[Recall Knowledge - Celestial](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Azata_Bralani.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Bralani](/Monsters.aspx?ID=559)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Azata" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=17" />
<trait label="Celestial" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=23" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 30 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +14; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +15, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +15, [Games Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +5

**Con** +3

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
[_+1 composite longbow_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74), [Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 120

**Resistances**
electricity 10

**Weaknesses**
cold iron 5, evil 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, fly 80 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
scimitar +16 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+8 slashing plus 2d6 electricity and 1d6 good

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite longbow +18 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 plus 1d6 electricity and 1d6 good

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 24
- **1st**
[Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=143) (at will)
- **2nd**
[Calm Emotions](/Spells.aspx?ID=31)
- **3rd**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Wall of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=367)
- **4th**
[Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129) (at will)
- **Constant (5th)**
[Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Fair Competition**  ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) Once per day, a bralani can spend 1 minute to bless willing creatures within 100 feet who are about to participate in a contest. This blessing lasts 24 hours. If a blessed creature cheats or uses the contest to harm another, the creature grows visibly ill, becoming [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) and unable to remove this condition for the duration or until they withdraw from the competition. At the end of the contest, participants who competed fairly find it easier to negotiate and understand their opponent's perspective. For 1 hour, they gain a +2 status bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks and [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) checks that directly pertain to their opponents.

**Whirlwind Blast** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The bralani generates a 20-foot line of scouring wind that deals 7d6 bludgeoning damage (DC 24 basic Reflex save). It can't use this ability again for 1d4 rounds.

**Wind Form**   A bralani flies at full Speed in [_gaseous form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=129).

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Bralani Contests</title>

Bralanis enjoy inventing games and contests and adding new twists to popular sports rather than following familiar rules. Speed often features somewhere in bralani games, whether it be physical speed or quickness of wit. It is not uncommon for bralanis to seek the input of young children, encouraging adults to draw inspiration from a child's creativity rather than allowing themselves to settle into comfortable and repetitive patterns.
</aside>
